item.title: Dice Dreams: Free Rolls For October 2025
item.description:
Jump Links

  • Dice Dreams Links For October 2025
  • How To Redeem Dice Links In Dice Dreams

From attacking opponents and collecting resources to upgrading your kingdom, Dice Dreams is a great option for everyone who enjoys board games with a competitive twist. As the name implies, the core mechanic of Dice Dreams revolves around rolling dice to determine movement and actions on the board.

If you feel like your dice supply is running low, you can use dice links to get free rolls in Dice Dreams . With these free rolls, you can continue rolling the dice to build your kingdom, collect resources, and compete with other players to become the true Dice King.

Updated October 5, 2025, by Usama Ali: Dice Dreams is all about rolling your way to the kingdom of your dreams, but running out of dice can quickly bring your progress to a halt. Luckily, the developers often share free reward links that give you bonus rolls, coins, and other helpful rewards to keep the fun going. These links are a great way to stay ahead without spending money or waiting for refills. Since they don’t last forever, it’s best to claim them as soon as they’re released. We update this guide daily with the latest Dice Dreams links so you never miss a reward.

We added five new links today.

Dice Dreams Links For October 2025

Like most board games, the developers of Dice Dreams regularly introduce dice links for players running low on dice. These links can be helpful in continuing your progress and can be used to redeem various rewards, including rolls and Building Blitz, which can consequently help you build your kingdom. Moreover, these links occasionally reward millions of coins, but most of the time, you'll receive rolls. Below is a list of active links that Dice Dreams players can use to earn some free goodies.

These links are only active for a limited time period, so make sure to redeem them before they expire.

In addition to redeeming rewards from these links, you can earn rolls in Dice Dreams through various other methods. These include regularly participating in events, inviting friends to the game, and taking advantage of in-game promotions and offers. While spending real money is not recommended, you can invite new players or link your Facebook account to get rolls for free.

Expired Dice Dream Links

Like most mobile games, Dice Dreams links expire quickly, usually within a day or so. Recently, there’s been a noticeable shift in the frequency of these link releases, and developers have reduced their quantity. As such, it’s uncertain how long the links will remain active moving forward. For your convenience, here are some expired Dice Dreams links:

How To Redeem Dice Links In Dice Dreams

To redeem a link in Dice Dreams for its reward, you'll first have to click on the links mentioned above. These links will redirect you to another page where you'll see "Get." Click on that, and you'll be redirected to your game, where you'll receive the respective rewards instantly.

You need to have the Dice Dreams app installed before clicking on the link, or else the links and "Get" button will not work.

Make sure to only click on dice links from trustworthy sources to avoid malware or data leakage issues. The links included here have been tried and tested to ensure players don't run into any problems.

item.title: Best Blue Lock Rivals Sound ID Codes (October 2025)
item.description:
Jump Links

  • All Blue Lock Rivals Sound ID Codes
  • How to Use Blue Lock Rivals Sound IDs
  • How to Get More Blue Lock Rivals Sound ID Codes

Blue Lock Rivals is a soccer game on Roblox with a huge active user base. This is not surprising, as the developers are constantly working to improve gameplay and add new content.

One of the game's great features is the ability to add custom sounds for goals and other actions. If you want to diversify the gameplay, you should use the Blue Lock Rivals sound ID codes from our guide.

Updated October 5, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: Blue Lock Rivals Sound IDs give you a variety of audio options to use in-game, from funny memes to intense effects. With a large collection available, you can pick sounds that match your style and make your matches more entertaining. New additions are also being introduced, so there are always fresh choices to try out. Keep checking back for the latest IDs so you don’t miss anything new.

All Blue Lock Rivals Sound ID Codes

How to Use Blue Lock Rivals Sound IDs

Sound IDs in Blue Lock Rivals are straightforward to use, but there is one inconvenient detail that may be concerning for many players. To apply custom sounds, you must purchase a game pass for 109 Robux. However, this is a small price to pay, so it's worth buying if you're a fan of this Roblox game. To help you, we've created a step-by-step guide explaining how to redeem codes in Blue Lock Rivals .

  • Launch Roblox and open Blue Lock Rivals .
  • Look at the bottom of the screen with a bunch of buttons. You need to click on the rightmost button, Settings.
  • Next, you will see three text fields. Enter the code in one of them, depending on your preference. Then click Set.
  • If you don't have a game pass yet, buy it. After that, you will be able to use different sound IDs during the game.

How to Get More Blue Lock Rivals Sound ID Codes

Blue Lock Rivals Sound ID codes can be found all over the internet, for example, on TikTok or in guides like this one. We cannot recommend a specific source for the sounds as there are so many of them, so we recommend bookmarking this page in your browser, as we will be updating it with new cool sounds from time to time.

item.title: Roblox: Click to Aura Farm Codes (October 2025)
item.description:
Click to Aura Farm is a Roblox game created on the wave of popularity of the aura farming kid meme. In this game, just like in the TikTok video, you will dance coolly at the front of the ship to make it sail even faster. Acceleration occurs through a mini-game where you have to click at the right moment.

In addition to your reaction speed, the choice of ship and oars also affects the result. You can roll them for in-game currency, but you'll have to make many attempts to get a rare item. Fortunately, you can get plenty of money without spending Robux by redeeming a few Click to Aura Farm codes from our list.

Updated October 5, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: Click to Aura Farm currently doesn’t have any active rewards available. Keep an eye on updates, as new opportunities to enhance your progress may appear in the future. Checking back regularly ensures you don’t miss out on upcoming bonuses.

All Click to Aura Farm Codes

Working Click to Aura Farm Codes

  • No active codes.

Expired Click to Aura Farm Codes

  • pets4life - Redeem this code to get cash.
  • upd3 - Redeem this code to get cash.
  • update2 - Redeem this code to get cash.
  • UPD1 - Redeem this code to get cash.
  • RELEASE - Redeem this code to get cash.

By redeeming Click to Aura Farm codes, you can get some money. They will be useful for both beginners and experienced players, as they will allow you to get better equipment.

How to Redeem Codes in Click to Aura Farm

When players receive free rewards in Roblox games, they tend to spend more time playing them, so developers often add the option to use these codes. To avoid confusing players, codes are usually used in familiar places, such as the interface or store. In Click to Aura Farm , this can be done in the game settings, but there are many buttons there, so it's easy to get confused. To help you with this, we've created a guide explaining how to redeem codes in Click to Aura Farm :

  • Launch Roblox and open Click to Aura Farm .
  • Look at the left side of the screen. Click on the gray button with the gear icon to go to settings.
  • Paste the code from the list of working codes into the white text field and click the green OK button.

Remember that most codes may expire over time, so redeem them immediately to make sure you get all the rewards.

How to Get More Click to Aura Farm Codes

You can find more Roblox codes in our guide. Just bookmark it in your browser to receive information about new working codes. It is also a good idea to visit the social media of the Click to Aura Farm developers:

  • Click to Aura Farm Roblox game page
  • Click to Aura Farm Roblox group
  • Click to Aura Farm Discord server

item.description:
Jump Links

  • All Fruit Battlegrounds Codes
  • How to Redeem Codes in Fruit Battlegrounds
  • Fruit Battlegrounds Tips & Tricks
  • Best Roblox Adventure Games Like Fruit Battlegrounds

Fruit Battlegrounds is an incredibly fun Roblox game with cool animations and a ton of abilities that can be used in action battles with other players. Codes are an integral part of almost any Roblox game, and Fruit Battlegrounds is no exception. They provide gems that can be very useful during gameplay, so fans of the game should feel free to scroll down and redeem these Fruit Battlegrounds codes while they are still active.

Updated October 5, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: Fruit Battlegrounds has several active codes that can give you a steady supply of gems. These rewards help you unlock more content and progress through the game without extra effort. Since codes change over time, it’s a good idea to redeem them quickly and check back often for new additions.

How to Redeem Codes in Fruit Battlegrounds

Players should follow the few steps mentioned below and claim codes for free:

  1. Open Roblox and launch Fruit Battlegrounds
  2. Choose the option Spin Fruit to enter the store.
  3. Click on the chest.
  4. In the screen’s bottom-left corner, you can see the special window for redeeming codes.
  5. Paste the code here and click the Redeem button. Codes will automatically store rewards on the account.

Fruit Battlegrounds Tips & Tricks

Spin Wisely

Players should use gems to spin for fruits and take advantage of the codes provided above to increase their gems count. They'll also want to save and equip rare or legendary fruits for better gameplay.

Use Feature

After 100 spins, players will be guaranteed good fruit. As such, they should keep spinning to make the most of this feature.

Level up efficiently

Using moves repeatedly will lead to them leveling up. Players can either fight other players or use their moves strategically to gain experience points.

Daily rewards

Players should log in daily to collect gems from the daily rewards feature.

item.title: Every Supergiant Game, Ranked
item.description:
Supergiant Games has become one of the most respected names in independent gaming. Every release carries its own mood, art, and rhythm, yet they all share the same attention to detail. When Bastion debuted in 2011, it set the tone for what Supergiant games would be like with its strong atmosphere, tight design, and reactive storytelling. Transistor shifted to a slower, more strategic pace while exploring themes of loss and memory. Pyre broke away from traditional combat turning battles into sports about freedom. Then came Hades, which reshaped the roguelike genre by combining quick action with ongoing relationships and story progression. Hades II builds on that same foundation with a darker tone, and new mythological focus.

Ranking these games is not only about naming the best one. It also shows how the studio and its ideas have grown over time. Each title pushed the boundaries a bit further, testing new combat modes, systems, and storytelling. From its first release to its latest, Supergiant has always tried to show that storytelling and gameplay can grow together, as you’ll see below.

Bastion

Introduced Supergiant’s Voice, Visuals, & Foundations For Greater Things

Bastion
10 /10
8.0 /10
Released
July 20, 2011

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL

Platform(s)
PS4, PS Vita, Xbox One, Xbox 360, Switch, PC, iOS
OpenCritic Rating
Mighty
Powered by

Bastion occupies this position, not because it’s a bad game, but because it feels like the rough draft of everything Supergiant would later perfect. This was their debut, the game that put them on the map. Players control the Kid as he rebuilds a shattered world, each piece of land rising beneath his feet as he explores. That mechanic was great in 2011, and still holds up as one of its most memorable features.

Combat in Bastion is simple but satisfying. The Kid can carry melee and ranged weapons, swapping them out as the journey unfolds. Enemies come in waves, and while the action is fun, it lacks the depth or variety of what came later. Compared to Hades or Transistor , it’s straightforward, almost barebones.

Transistor

Turn-Based Sci-Fi Where Red Uncovers The Camerata’s Plot

Transistor
8 /10
9.0 /10
Released
May 20, 2014

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL

Platform(s)
PS4, Switch, PC, iOS
OpenCritic Rating
Mighty
Powered by

Transistor is fun, stylish, and clever, but not as approachable as the higher-ranking games on this list. The story follows Red, a singer who loses her voice and carries the Transistor, which houses the consciousness of someone close to her. The weapon speaks throughout the game, guiding her where necessary. Where Transistor really shines is in its atmosphere. The city is drenched in neon lights, full of art-deco detail. The soundtrack mixes haunting vocals with electronic beats, fitting perfectly with the futuristic setting.

Combat is turn-based, which lets players map out complex combos and then watch them unfold in rapid execution. It’s flexible and creative, with abilities that can be slotted into different roles for endless experimentation. The only issue is that it can feel a bit slower and more cerebral than other action-focused Supergiant titles.

Pyre

Teams On Exile Compete In The Rites To Earn Their Freedom

Pyre
9 /10
8.0 /10
Released
July 25, 2017

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL

Platform(s)
PC, PS4
OpenCritic Rating
Mighty
Powered by

Pyre lands in the middle of the ranking because it’s both fascinating and divisive. Instead of fast action, it combines narrative choices with a mystical sports game. Players control exiles who compete in the Rites, which are basically ritual matches where the goal is to carry a glowing orb into the opponent’s pyre. Win, and you may free an ally from exile. Lose, and someone stays behind.

The Rites sport itself is unusual. It mixes positioning, teamwork, and quick decision-making, but it doesn’t have the immediate appeal of swinging a sword or firing a bow. Some players loved the slower, more strategic pace, while others bounced off it. That’s why Pyre doesn’t rank higher. It’s brilliant in its ambition, but harder to recommend universally.

Hades 2

Melinoë’s Battle Against Chronos Features Expanded Magic & Larger Worlds

Hades 2
9.8 /10
Released
September 25, 2025

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL

Platform(s)
Nintendo Switch, Nintendo Switch 2, PC
OpenCritic Rating
Mighty
Powered by

Hades 2 earns second place because it expands the formula while giving players a fresh perspective. This time the focus is on Melinoë, Zagreus’s sister, who fights against Chronos, the Titan of Time. Her style is more magical than her brother’s, leaning on spells and sorcery instead of pure weapon mastery. That change alone makes the game feel different while keeping the foundation of what made the first so strong.

The loop remains familiar: explore new areas, collect resources, push through tougher enemies, and return home to progress the story. But Hades 2 adds more layers. There are bigger skill trees, more complex crafting systems, and expanded environments. These additions give long-term depth, but they also slow down the pace compared to the tight, focused design of the first game. It’s still excellent, but a little less sharp.

Hades

Greek Gods Shape Every Run, And Death Pushes The Story Forward

Hades
10 /10
17
8.9 /10
Released
September 17, 2020

WHERE TO PLAY

SUBSCRIPTION
DIGITAL
PHYSICAL

OpenCritic Rating
Mighty
Powered by

Hades sits at the top of this ranking for good reason. It took a genre that is usually considered tough, punishing, and niche (roguelikes) and made it enjoyable for a wider audience without removing the challenge that makes those games exciting. Roguelikes usually punish failure harshly, but here, dying is part of the experience. Every time Zagreus falls in battle, he returns home to find new dialogue, character growth, and upgrades that carry into the next attempt. Instead of frustration, players get curiosity.

This is one of those roguelikes where the classes and weapons all feel different, from the quick fists to the slow, heavy bow. And that’s why the combat works so well. Add in godly boons that change how each weapon behaves, and no two runs are ever the same. One attempt might have a shield that reflects projectiles, while another might give Zag's sword attacks a damage-over-time effect. The variety keeps it exciting, and the flow of combat is fast and responsive without being overwhelming.
